attributes.action: prosecute kate and gerry mccann for child neglect
attributes.additional_details: Why have the mccanns not been prosecuted for child neglect? The police say there is not enough evidence and yet the mccanns have admitted that they left their children on their own on more than one occasion during their holiday. How much evidence do they need when they have a confession. Why are they subjected to double standards, when other parents have been prosecuted for leaving their children alone.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter.
